lagrange.utils

Class TimeConvert

  • java.lang.Object
    • lagrange.utils.TimeConvert

  • public class TimeConvert
extends java.lang.Object
    Performs basic time conversions to and from milliseconds.
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool
